DOC.brief_summary: To assess the overall response rate to docetaxel plus CDDP as neoadjuvant chemotherapy prior to surgery, followed by adjuvant docetaxel plus CDDP in chemonaive patients NSCLC Stage IIIa and IIIb.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study of Docetaxel Plus CDDP for NSCLC Stage III
